title: Apron, ca. 1896
medium:
Medium: beads, hide
Technique: beads strung and wrapped around leather core
description: Rectangular panel of beads attached to a cord, solidly beaded with trade beads with a white ground, red borders, and fringed with black, blue and white tassels.
